entries.name: robot_talk_3
entries.speaker: QT7JBf1X9NUUSTG
entries.text: <#cedde2>Anika resides in The Treasury, to the left of where I am. Go figure!

entries.name: anika_talk_1
entries.speaker: TYkN8EEaSNS0JrE
entries.text: <#cedde2>One hundred two, one hundred three... Oh sorry!, didn't see you there. You must be the new one in town, right?

entries.name: anika_talk_2
entries.speaker: TYkN8EEaSNS0JrE
entries.text: <#cedde2>That robot told you to come see me? Oh of course, your newcommer programme! Here's your 1000 coins, to get things started

entries.name: anika_talk_3
entries.speaker: TYkN8EEaSNS0JrE
entries.text: <#cedde2>Here in Darwin we use coins to enchange goods. I am also the banker, so if you want to store your coins come talk to me!

entries.name: pris_talk_4
entries.speaker: QT7JBf1X9NUUSTG
entries.text: <#cedde2>Already done? That's fast! Oh, do you know that each person here have their own private island?

entries.name: pris_talk_5
entries.speaker: QT7JBf1X9NUUSTG
entries.text: <#cedde2>You don't? Oh yeah, no one has told you about this yet! So you haven't created your own?

entries.name: and_quest_update_1
entries.message:
<white>ꁨ <#496cb3><bold>ǫᴜᴇsᴛ ᴜᴘᴅᴀᴛᴇᴅ!</bold>
<white>             A New Dawn

<#819dd6>             ᴛᴀsᴋ <#7f98fa>2</#7f98fa>: <#e6eafa>Go talk to PS-06 DR0!D again.

entries.name: and_quest_update_2
entries.message:
<white>ꁨ <#496cb3><bold>ǫᴜᴇsᴛ ᴜᴘᴅᴀᴛᴇᴅ!</bold>
<white>             A New Dawn

<#819dd6>             ᴛᴀsᴋ <#7f98fa>3</#7f98fa>: <#e6eafa>Create your own private island!

entries.name: pris_talk_8
entries.speaker: QT7JBf1X9NUUSTG
entries.text: <#cedde2>Your own private island! How exciting! Now you can properly begin your journey here. Farm resources, mine ores and progress!

entries.name: pris_talk_9
entries.speaker: QT7JBf1X9NUUSTG
entries.text: <#cedde2>Remember to talk to other villagers too! Well, I suppose I shouldn't waste any more of your time! Have fun in Prism Skyblock!

entries.name: pris_talk_6
entries.speaker: QT7JBf1X9NUUSTG
entries.text: <#cedde2>Then it is time for you to create your own private island!

entries.name: pris_talk_7
entries.speaker: QT7JBf1X9NUUSTG
entries.text: <#cedde2>Oh wait... you already have a private island! Well, this is awkward...

entries.name: robot_talk_1
entries.speaker: QT7JBf1X9NUUSTG
entries.text: <#cedde2>Bip bip! %player_name% it is? I'm a helper droid no6, Lewis assigned me earlier to welcome you to Darwin! *bipbip*

entries.name: robot_talk_2
entries.speaker: QT7JBf1X9NUUSTG
entries.text: <#cedde2>Our town has a helper finance programme for newcomers! You should go talk to Anika to claim your programme!
